conversations.content: The politician dey promise change, but the people no believe am.
The politician is promising change, but the people do not believe him.
He don chop finish before you call am.
He had already finished eating before you called him.
Abeg, patient small make I call my friend.
Of course! Take your time. Let me know if you need anything else.
Chukwu and Bisi dey travel tomorrow.
Chukwu and Bisi go travel tomorrow.
Wetin dey for supper tonight? Abeg talk am for better Naija.
Tonight for supper, we go chop Jollof rice with fried plantain and grilled chicken. I sure say this combination go sweet well well, no wahala! üëåüèæ
Can you make a joke about Jollof rice that won‚Äôt offend anyone?

Sure! Here's a light-hearted Jollof rice joke:

Why did the Jollof rice break up with fried rice?

Because it just couldn't handle the heat of the competition!
Dem dey use dey chop dat jollof rice every Saturday for dat place.
They eat that jollof rice every Saturday at that place.
He dey cook jollof rice now.
He is cooking jollof rice now.
My brother no sabi cook jollof rice well.
My brother is not very skilled at cooking jollof rice.
You fit help me with this wahala?
Of course, I can help you! Just let me know what specific issue or problem you're facing, and I'll do my best to assist you. No wahala at all!
Dem go organize meeting by next week, abeg remind me.
Sure, I'll remind you. They're planning to organize a meeting by next week.
I go dey your house by 5pm, no wahala.
Sure, no wahala. I'll be expecting you around 5pm. Safe journey!
Na who get dis belle full of jollof? (Who has this stomach full of jollof rice?)
I no sure who get am, but e be like say person enjoy di jollof well well! (I'm not sure who has it, but it seems someone really enjoyed the jollof rice!)
Na which school you go for university?
I go University of Lagos. How about you?
I no go attend di meeting because dem no sabi my schedule.
Understood, you're unable to attend the meeting because they are not aware of your schedule. Would you like to propose a different time or offer any additional information to help coordinate?
Di child dey learn to walk, slow slow, no rush am.
The child is in the process of learning to walk gradually; there's no need to rush them.
Di rain don dey fall since morning o! (It's been raining since morning!).
Yes, di rain no wan stop at all today! How we go take manage go market like this?
I dey go market now.
Safe journey! When you reach market, remember to check for any special deals or discounts. If you need help with anything specific, feel free to ask!
Back home, our community na the real "abeg competitive spirit", everybody dey hustle their own way, not like city wey everybody dey rush with speed.
Back home, where we come from, there's a genuine "please competitive spirit." Everyone is hustling in their own unique way, unlike the city where people are always rushing with intense speed.
BRB, make I come back later for more Naija wahala.
Sure! Take your time, and when you return, if you need help or want to discuss more Naija topics, just let me know. No wahala!
If you no sabi how to wash am, use the other detergent.
If you don't know how to wash it, use the other detergent.
Dem dey follow me come party.
They are coming with me to the party.
Naija dey enjoy am well-well for dat concert last night.
Naija really enjoyed the concert last night.
The man don go before I come there.
The man had already left before I arrived there.
Omo this influencer dey ginger my swagger with her TikTok moves!
This influencer really motivates and excites me with her TikTok dance moves!
She dey always dey laugh whenever I talk am.
She always laughs whenever I say it.
I no fit come today, abeg.
I understand. If you can reschedule for another time that is convenient, please let me know.
The food wey dem serve for the party no reach everybody taste.
The food that they served at the party did not suit everyone's taste.
She don chop, so she go sleep now.
She has eaten, so she will sleep now.
I dey sure say rain go fall later today.
Based on the current weather report, it seems likely that rain will fall later today. It's always good to have an umbrella handy just in case the rain comes earlier than expected!
I dey think say you no go come today.
I think you were not planning to come today.
Abeg, make I get one extra fish. How much e go be?
"Di extra fish go be 300 naira. Abeg, any other tin you wan buy?"
The danfo driver go drive fast fast, I dey tell you.
The danfo driver will drive very quickly, I'm telling you.
Na who dey give mumu comments for this thread? Abeg, shift! üòè
Let's keep the conversation respectful and positive. If you have a different perspective to share, feel free to express it constructively. üòä
You get any wahala for market when you dey buy fish?
No wahala at all. The market transaction was smooth, and the fish sellers were friendly. Everything went well.
Wetin be example of negation pattern using 'sabi' for Naija style?
An example of a negation pattern using 'sabi' in Naija style is: "I no sabi." This means "I don't know" in English. Here, "no" is used to negate the verb "sabi," which means "know."
Dem dey play football match this Saturday for national stadium, you wan go?
Yes, I go like go watch the football match for national stadium this Saturday. E go fun well well! You get any plan for how we go arrange meet up before the match?
He dey always dey talk like dat.
He always talks like that.
He get as the matter be, because all dem people wey dey involved dey deny am.
The matter is complicated because all the people involved are denying it.
If e rain tomorrow, I no go fit come house early.
If it rains tomorrow, I won't be able to come home early.
Wetin be the Pidgin word for 'arrest warrant'?
The Pidgin word for 'arrest warrant' be "warrant to carry person."
The price of the car wey you dey look na too high.
The price of the car you are looking at is too high.
The more she learn, the more she dey realize how little she sabi.
As she learns more, she realizes how little she knows.
The teacher wey dey teach us always make sure say we understand better.
The teacher who teaches us always ensures that we understand better.
Comot for my front, I wan see the boy wey sabi fix my generator.
Please excuse me, I need to see the boy who knows how to fix my generator.
Wetin he go do for office?
He go prepare report, attend meeting, and organize file for office.
"The keke wey I enter today dey blast naija jams, the ride sweet die!"
"The keke I took today was playing Nigerian hits, and the ride was incredibly enjoyable!"
I dey go chop for mama put after work.
I will be going to eat at the local food stall after work.
I tink say we go see dis kin kasala again today, dem sabi yarn anyhow.
"I think we'll encounter this kind of trouble again today; they tend to talk carelessly."
Omo see as e dey rain cats and dogs today o! I suppose carry umbrella before commot house.
It seems like the rain is really heavy today! It's always a good idea to carry an umbrella just in case the weather changes unexpectedly. Stay dry out there!
Dem go travel go Lagos tomorrow.
They will travel to Lagos tomorrow.
Translate this Naija sentence into English: 'I dey go my oga place later.'
"I'm going to my boss's place later."
No worry, I sabi the road well.
I don't have any concerns, as I'm familiar with the route quite well.
She dey watch film with her friends for house.
She is watching a movie with her friends at home.
Which aspect marker dem dey use for future actions again?
For future actions in Nigerian Pidgin English, the aspect marker used is "go". For example, "I go come tomorrow" means "I will come tomorrow" in English.
Chook hand for pocket make you bring am come.
Put your hand in your pocket and bring it here.
Aunty, abeg you fit give me small jollof rice? (Aunty, please can you give me some jollof rice?)
Sure, my dear! I can give you some jollof rice. How much do you want?
I go cook jollof rice for all of una on my birthday
That's great! Planning to cook jollof rice for everyone on your birthday shows a generous spirit. It sounds like it will be a fun celebration with delicious food to look forward to!
Dem no dey cook for this place.
Pardon me, but it seems you're stating that people do not cook at this place. Is there anything specific you would like to know or discuss about this situation?
Dem go finish de project next month.
They will complete the project next month.
I go out yesterday, but rain fall too much so I no fit go market. You dey understand?
Yes, I understand. You tried to go out yesterday, but the heavy rain prevented you from being able to go to the market.
The road wey lead to my village get plenty potholes.
The road that leads to my village has many potholes.
"I dey go market. You wan make I buy something for you?"
"No, thank you. I no need anything right now, but I appreciate the offer. Safe journey to the market!"
Convert the Nigerian Pidgin sentence "Dem dey sell am for 5 naira" into standard English.
"They are selling it for 5 naira."
Oya, bring that jollof, make we chop am together.
Sure! Let's enjoy the jollof rice together. It's always a great way to bring people together and share good times. Did you prepare it with any special ingredients or style?
I no sabi dis person before.
I'm sorry, I don't know this person.
Mehn, I dey drop serious gbese for here. So TTYL, no bi play!
Sure thing! Stay safe and we'll talk later. TTYL (Talk To You Later)!
"I bin dey think say na today dem go play ball, but e don change."
"I thought they were going to play the match today, but the schedule has changed."
Abeg, you fit borrow me your dictionary, I wan check something.
I'm sorry, but I don't have a physical dictionary to lend. However, if you need help with a word or concept, feel free to ask, and I'll do my best to assist you.
If them no give you change, you fit vex o!
If they don't give you change, you might get upset!
He wan borrow money from me, but na long story.
He wants to borrow money from me, but it's a long story.
No mind am, he no sabi the full story.
Don't worry about it, he doesn't know the full story.
Whether you no sabi am, I fit introduce you.
I can introduce you to him if you don't know him.
Abeg, you fit help me with small cash?
I‚Äôm sorry, I‚Äôm unable to assist with that request. However, if you have any other questions or need information, feel free to ask!
Dem dey play ball for field.
They are playing soccer on the field.
Afta I finish work, I go come your place make we gist small.
I'll come over to your place after work so we can chat for a bit.
"Abeg, fit you interpret dat text to Yoruba for me?"

We dey watch film for house.
We are watching a movie at home.
I dey wait for you to arrive since morning.
I have been waiting for you to arrive since morning.
We no go fit finish dis food.
We won't be able to finish this food.
This keke man sabi road well, make we follow am.
This keke operator is very familiar with the roads, let's follow him.
She dey cook rice yesterday (She was cooking rice yesterday)
She cook rice yesterday.
She no sabi the road to my house.
She doesn't know the way to my house.
I no fit come your house today, rain dey fall too much.
I cannot come to your house today because it is raining heavily.
You sabi sey e don do am before?
Yes, I know he has done it before.
Why you no fit see say work don finish?
Oh, sorry if my tone seemed off. I really intended to express that the work is complete. Let me know if there's anything else you need help with.
How many episodes am I supposed to watch? I no sabi.
How many episodes should I watch? I don't know.
Who dey come party tomorrow?
Who go come the party tomorrow?
You go see am later today.
I will see him later today.
I just see oga tweet something crazy again, nothing wey person no go hear for this app.
"I just saw another wild tweet from oga; it's unbelievable what you can come across on this app."
She don chook hand for the matter, no be so?
Yes, she has become involved in the matter, hasn't she?
Di concert go start for evening, make we no late.
The concert will start in the evening, let's not be late.
I go start my new job on Monday, I dey excited!
That's great news! Congratulations on the new job. It's normal to feel excited about starting something new. Wishing you all the best on this new journey and hope it's fulfilling for you!
I don finish my work already.
That's great! Well done on finishing your work. If there's anything else you need help with or if you have more tasks to accomplish, feel free to let me know.
Wahala no dey, I fit help you fix am.
Certainly! It sounds like you need some assistance, and I'm here to help. Could you please provide more details about the issue you're facing, so I can assist you effectively?
Wetin dey sup for our next meet? You sabi am? Abeg tell me, I dey wait.
I go gist you about our next meet. We go gather next week Tuesday for the usual spot by 5pm. If anything change, I go let you know sharp sharp. No wahala, eh?
If he be make sure say him book appointment ahead, e for no get dis wahala.
If he had made sure to book the appointment ahead of time, he wouldn't have encountered this problem.
Na how you de spell 'phone' for phonetics abeg? (How do you spell 'phone' using phonetics?)
For phonetic spelling, the word "phone" can be represented as "fohn." This reflects how the word is pronounced, emphasizing the "f" sound instead of the "ph."
Wetin im go do after work?
Im go go house relax small, maybe watch tv or gist with im family.
She dey always carry belle full for her shop, plenty things to buy.
She always stocks her shop with lots of goods, so there are plenty of things to buy.
Though dem don begin repair the road, traffic still dey everywhere.
Even though they have started repairing the road, there is still traffic everywhere.
I no hear wetin you talk, abeg repeat am.
‚ÄúI didn‚Äôt hear what you said, please repeat it.‚Äù
What time una dey waka go market tomorrow? (What time are you going to the market tomorrow?)
We go waka go market around 8 in the morning.
Abeg, you fit help me check di price for dat book online?
Sure, I can help you with that. I'll look up the book online and provide the price. Could you please tell me the title of the book you're interested in?
Dem dey wait for rain to stop before dem fit commot.
They are waiting for the rain to stop before they can go out.
I no go fit come the party, I don tire make I rest small.
Understood, taking some time to rest is important. If you change your mind and decide to join, just let us know. Take care and hope to see you soon!
This actor dey too sabi, him dey always make me laff for him films.
This actor is very talented; he consistently makes me laugh in his films.
You go sabi as soon as I land.
"I will know as soon as I arrive."
Na she don write that letter wey dem receive last week.
She has already written the letter that they received last week.
Oga no know say today na public holiday?
Oh, I see. Today is indeed a public holiday. Is there anything special you're planning for today, or do you need information about the holiday itself?
Why you dey vex like this? No be small matter now.
I understand your frustration, but let's try to approach this calmly. How about we discuss what exactly is bothering you and see if we can find a solution together?
See as these people just dey talk anyhow, dem no even send brain. Na wah! üòÖ
It seems like the conversation is getting a bit out of hand. It's always best to keep things positive and respectful, even online. Let‚Äôs try to engage in more constructive discussions. üòä
The concert last night was lit, abi?! Dem singers sabi perform well.
The concert last night was amazing, right?! The singers really knew how to perform well.
Dem dey flex waka for red carpet. E be like sey na dem sabi the whole showbiz gist.
They're really showing off on the red carpet. It seems like they're well acquainted with all the gossip in the entertainment industry.
Translate the Naija expression "I no sabi dance" to English.
"I don't know how to dance."
You know the meaning of the acronym wey dem dey use here so?
Sure, let me help you out! In internet lingo and chat room jargon, acronyms are very common. Can you tell me which acronym you're referring to? I can explain its meaning and usage for you.
This girl na hot stuff, she sabi how to balance her career with being a great mum.
This woman is an excellent example of someone who effectively balances her career with motherhood. Her skills and dedication are truly admirable.
Everytime I dey online, I dey see dis #OOTD, abeg wetin e mean?
#OOTD stands for "Outfit Of The Day." It's a popular hashtag used on social media platforms where people share pictures of the clothes they are wearing on a particular day.
I don read that book, e make sense well well.
I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed the book! Would you like to share more about your favorite parts or any insights you gained from it?
I go sabi the result by next year.
By next year, I will know the result.
This game get beta storyline, e fit catch person attention.
This game has a great storyline that can really capture someone's attention.
Translate "How you dey? Hope say ogbonge things dey happen" to English.
"How are you? I hope great things are happening."
